00014 // DirectDrawSurface2 Calls
00015 void
00016 DDCreateSurface ( LPDIRECTDRAW2 pExistingDirectDraw,
00017                                                 DDSURFACEDESC *pNewSurfaceDesc,
00018                                                 LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE *ppNewSurface1,
00019                                                 LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 *ppNewSurface2 )
00020 {
00021       Assert ( pExistingDirectDraw != NULL );
00022       Assert ( pNewSurfaceDesc != NULL );
00023       Assert ( ppNewSurface1 != NULL );
00024       Assert ( ppNewSurface2 != NULL );
00025 
00026       // create the directdraw surface
00027       ATTEMPT ( IDirectDraw2_CreateSurface ( pExistingDirectDraw,
00028                                     pNewSurfaceDesc, ppNewSurface1, NULL ) );
00029 
00030       //get the direct draw surface 2 interface
00031       ATTEMPT ( IDirectDrawSurface_QueryInterface ( *ppNewSurface1,     /*&*/IID_IDirectDrawSurface2, (LPVOID*) ppNewSurface2 ) ); // (jonathanl)
00032 }
00033 
00034 
00035 // DirectDrawSurface2 Calls
00036 void
00037 DDCreateSurfaceInMemory ( LPDIRECTDRAW2 pExistingDirectDraw,
00038                                                 DDSURFACEDESC *pNewSurfaceDesc,
00039                                                 BOOLEAN fVideoMemory, LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE *ppNewSurface1,
00040                                                 LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 *ppNewSurface2 )
00041 {
00042       DDSURFACEDESC     DDSurfaceDesc;
00043       BOOLEAN                 fDestination;
00044 
00045       Assert ( pExistingDirectDraw != NULL );
00046       Assert ( pNewSurfaceDesc != NULL );
00047       Assert ( ppNewSurface1 != NULL );
00048       Assert ( ppNewSurface2 != NULL );
00049 
00050       // copy to a local so we don't change the input parameter
00051       memcpy ( &DDSurfaceDesc, pNewSurfaceDesc, sizeof ( DDSURFACEDESC ) );
00052       
00053       // must have caps set since we are adding to the ddsCaps element
00054       DDSurfaceDesc.dwFlags |= DDSD_CAPS;
00055 
00056       // If this is a hardware D3D driver, the Z-Buffer MUST end up in video
00057       // memory.  Otherwise, it MUST end up in system memory.
00058       if ( fVideoMemory )
00059             DDSurfaceDesc.ddsCaps.dwCaps |= DDSCAPS_VIDEOMEMORY;
00060       else
00061             DDSurfaceDesc.ddsCaps.dwCaps |= DDSCAPS_SYSTEMMEMORY;
00062 
00063       // create the surface
00064       DDCreateSurface ( pExistingDirectDraw, &DDSurfaceDesc, ppNewSurface1, ppNewSurface2 );
00065 
00066    // get surface information
00067       DDGetSurfaceDescription ( *ppNewSurface2, &DDSurfaceDesc );
00068 
00069       // was the surface created in video memory?
00070       fDestination = ( DDSurfaceDesc.ddsCaps.dwCaps & DDSCAPS_VIDEOMEMORY ) ?
00071                                                                               TRUE : FALSE;
00072 
00073       // did we create the surface in the right memory area?
00074       if ( fDestination != fVideoMemory )
00075       {
00076             // nope we couldn't do it right so release the newly created surface
00077             // and pass back a NULL pointer to the user
00078             DDReleaseSurface ( ppNewSurface1, ppNewSurface2 );
00079       }
00080 }
00081 
00082 // Lock, unlock calls
00083 void DDLockSurface ( LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 pSurface, LPRECT pDestRect, LPDDSURFACEDESC pSurfaceDesc, UINT32 uiFlags, HANDLE hEvent )
00084 {
00085       HRESULT ReturnCode;
00086 
00087       Assert( pSurface != NULL );
00088       Assert( pSurfaceDesc != NULL );
00089 
00090       ZEROMEM ( *pSurfaceDesc );
00091       pSurfaceDesc->dwSize = sizeof(DDSURFACEDESC);
00092 
00093       do
00094       {
00095             ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_Lock( pSurface, pDestRect, pSurfaceDesc, uiFlags, hEvent);
00096 
00097       } while( ReturnCode == DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING );
00098 
00099       ATTEMPT( ReturnCode );
00100 
00101 }
00102 
00103 void DDUnlockSurface( LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 pSurface, PTR pSurfaceData )
00104 {
00105       Assert( pSurface != NULL );
00106 
00107       ATTEMPT( IDirectDrawSurface2_Unlock( pSurface, pSurfaceData ) );
00108 
00109 }

00132 void DDCreateRasterSurface ( LPDIRECTDRAW2 pDirectDraw, INT32 iWidth, INT32 iHeight,
00133                                                         BOOLEAN fVideoMemory,
00134                                                         LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE *ppRasterSurface1,
00135                                                         LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 *ppRasterSurface2 )
00136 {
00137       DDSURFACEDESC     DDSurfaceDesc;
00138 
00139       // validate used portions of the structure
00140       Assert ( pDirectDraw != NULL );
00141       Assert ( iWidth != 0 );
00142       Assert ( iHeight != 0 );
00143       Assert ( ppRasterSurface1 != NULL );
00144       Assert ( ppRasterSurface2 != NULL );
00145 
00146       // create the raster surface
00147       ZEROMEM ( DDSurfaceDesc );
00148       DDSurfaceDesc.dwSize          = sizeof ( DDSurfaceDesc );
00149       DDSurfaceDesc.dwFlags   = DDSD_CAPS | DDSD_HEIGHT | DDSD_WIDTH;
00150       DDSurfaceDesc.dwWidth   = iWidth;
00151       DDSurfaceDesc.dwHeight  = iHeight;
00152       DDSurfaceDesc.ddsCaps.dwCaps = DDSCAPS_3DDEVICE | DDSCAPS_OFFSCREENPLAIN;
00153       DDCreateSurfaceInMemory ( pDirectDraw, &DDSurfaceDesc, fVideoMemory, ppRasterSurface1, ppRasterSurface2 );
00154 }
00155 
00156 void DDCreateZBufferSurface ( LPDIRECTDRAW2 pDirectDraw, INT32 iWidth, INT32 iHeight,
00157                                                         BOOLEAN fVideoMemory,
00158                                                         LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE *ppZBufferSurface1,
00159                                                         LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 *ppZBufferSurface2 )
00160 {
00161       DDSURFACEDESC     DDSurfaceDesc;
00162 
00163       // validate used portions of the structure
00164       Assert ( pDirectDraw != NULL );
00165       Assert ( iWidth != 0 );
00166       Assert ( iHeight != 0 );
00167       Assert ( ppZBufferSurface1 != NULL );
00168       Assert ( ppZBufferSurface2 != NULL );
00169 
00170       // create the z buffer
00171       ZEROMEM ( DDSurfaceDesc );
00172       DDSurfaceDesc.dwSize          = sizeof ( DDSurfaceDesc );
00173       DDSurfaceDesc.dwFlags   = DDSD_CAPS | DDSD_HEIGHT | DDSD_WIDTH | DDSD_ZBUFFERBITDEPTH;
00174       DDSurfaceDesc.dwWidth   = iWidth;
00175       DDSurfaceDesc.dwHeight  = iHeight;
00176       DDSurfaceDesc.dwZBufferBitDepth     = 16;
00177       DDSurfaceDesc.ddsCaps.dwCaps        = DDSCAPS_ZBUFFER;
00178       DDCreateSurfaceInMemory ( pDirectDraw, &DDSurfaceDesc, fVideoMemory, ppZBufferSurface1, ppZBufferSurface2 );
00179 }

00194 DDDeleteAttachedSurface (     LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 pParentSurface,

00196 {

00205 void
00206 DDReleaseSurface ( LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE *ppOldSurface1, LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 *ppOldSurface2 )
00207 {
00208       Assert ( ppOldSurface1 != NULL );
00209       Assert ( ppOldSurface2 != NULL );
00210       Assert ( *ppOldSurface1 != NULL );
00211       Assert ( *ppOldSurface2 != NULL );
00212 
00213       ATTEMPT ( IDirectDrawSurface2_Release ( *ppOldSurface2 ) );
00214       ATTEMPT ( IDirectDrawSurface_Release ( *ppOldSurface1 ) );
00215 
00216       *ppOldSurface1 = NULL;
00217       *ppOldSurface2 = NULL;
00218 }

00389 HRESULT BltFastDDSurfaceUsingSoftware( LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 pDestSurface, INT32 uiX, INT32 uiY, LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 pSrcSurface, LPRECT pSrcRect, UINT32 uiTrans )
00390 {
00391       DDSURFACEDESC SurfaceDescription;
00392       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00393       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00394   HRESULT       ReturnCode;
00395   DDCOLORKEY    ColorKey;
00396       UINT16                        us16BPPColorKey;
00397 
00398 
00399       // Lock surfaces
00400       DDLockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pDestSurface, NULL, &SurfaceDescription, 0, NULL);
00401       uiDestPitchBYTES = SurfaceDescription.lPitch;
00402       pDestBuf                       = (UINT8 *) SurfaceDescription.lpSurface;
00403 
00404 
00405       // Lock surfaces
00406       DDLockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pSrcSurface, NULL, &SurfaceDescription, 0, NULL);
00407       uiSrcPitchBYTES = SurfaceDescription.lPitch;
00408       pSrcBuf                        = (UINT8 *) SurfaceDescription.lpSurface;
00409 
00410       if ( uiTrans == DDBLTFAST_NOCOLORKEY )
00411       {
00412             Blt16BPPTo16BPP( (UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00413                               (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00414                               uiX , uiY, 
00415                               pSrcRect->left , pSrcRect->top, 
00416                               ( pSrcRect->right - pSrcRect->left ), 
00417                               ( pSrcRect->bottom - pSrcRect->top ) );
00418       }
00419       else if ( uiTrans == DDBLTFAST_SRCCOLORKEY )
00420       {
00421             // Get 16 bpp color key.....
00422             ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_GetColorKey( pSrcSurface, DDCKEY_SRCBLT, &ColorKey);
00423 
00424         if (ReturnCode == DD_OK)
00425             {
00426                   us16BPPColorKey = (UINT16)ColorKey.dwColorSpaceLowValue;
00427 
00428                   Blt16BPPTo16BPPTrans( (UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00429                                     (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00430                                     uiX , uiY, 
00431                                     pSrcRect->left , pSrcRect->top, 
00432                                     ( pSrcRect->right - pSrcRect->left ), 
00433                                     ( pSrcRect->bottom - pSrcRect->top ), us16BPPColorKey );
00434 
00435             }
00436       }
00437       else 
00438       {
00439             // Not supported.....
00440       }
00441 
00442 
00443       DDUnlockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pDestSurface, NULL );
00444       DDUnlockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pSrcSurface, NULL );
00445 
00446       return( DD_OK );
00447 }
00448 
00449 
00450 HRESULT BltDDSurfaceUsingSoftware( LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 pDestSurface, LPRECT pDestRect, LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2 pSrcSurface, LPRECT pSrcRect, UINT32 uiFlags, LPDDBLTFX pDDBltFx )
00451 {
00452       DDSURFACEDESC SurfaceDescription;
00453       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00454       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00455   HRESULT       ReturnCode;
00456   DDCOLORKEY    ColorKey;
00457       UINT16                        us16BPPColorKey;
00458 
00459 
00460       // Lock surfaces
00461       DDLockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pDestSurface, NULL, &SurfaceDescription, 0, NULL);
00462       uiDestPitchBYTES = SurfaceDescription.lPitch;
00463       pDestBuf                       = (UINT8 *) SurfaceDescription.lpSurface;
00464 
00465 
00466       if ( pSrcSurface != NULL )
00467       {
00468             // Lock surfaces
00469             DDLockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pSrcSurface, NULL, &SurfaceDescription, 0, NULL);
00470             uiSrcPitchBYTES = SurfaceDescription.lPitch;
00471             pSrcBuf                        = (UINT8 *) SurfaceDescription.lpSurface;
00472       }
00473 
00474       if ( pSrcRect != NULL && 
00475                    ( ( pSrcRect->right - pSrcRect->left ) != ( pDestRect->right - pDestRect->left ) ||
00476                    ( pSrcRect->bottom - pSrcRect->top ) != ( pDestRect->bottom - pDestRect->top ) ) )
00477       {
00478             DDUnlockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pDestSurface, NULL );
00479 
00480             if ( pSrcSurface != NULL )
00481             {
00482                   DDUnlockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pSrcSurface, NULL );
00483             }
00484 
00485             // Fall back to DD
00486             IDirectDrawSurface2_Blt( pDestSurface, pDestRect, pSrcSurface, pSrcRect, uiFlags, pDDBltFx );
00487 
00488             return( DD_OK );
00489       }
00490       else if ( uiFlags == DDBLT_WAIT )
00491       {
00492             // Lock surfaces
00493             DDLockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pSrcSurface, NULL, &SurfaceDescription, 0, NULL);
00494             uiSrcPitchBYTES = SurfaceDescription.lPitch;
00495             pSrcBuf                        = (UINT8 *) SurfaceDescription.lpSurface;
00496 
00497             Blt16BPPTo16BPP( (UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00498                               (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00499                               pDestRect->left , pDestRect->top, 
00500                               pSrcRect->left , pSrcRect->top, 
00501                               ( pSrcRect->right - pSrcRect->left ), 
00502                               ( pSrcRect->bottom - pSrcRect->top ) );
00503       }
00504       else if ( uiFlags & DDBLT_KEYSRC )
00505       {
00506             // Get 16 bpp color key.....
00507             ReturnCode = IDirectDrawSurface2_GetColorKey( pSrcSurface, DDCKEY_SRCBLT, &ColorKey);
00508 
00509         if (ReturnCode == DD_OK)
00510             {
00511                   us16BPPColorKey = (UINT16)ColorKey.dwColorSpaceLowValue;
00512 
00513                   Blt16BPPTo16BPPTrans( (UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00514                                     (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00515                                     pDestRect->left , pDestRect->top, 
00516                                     pSrcRect->left , pSrcRect->top, 
00517                                     ( pSrcRect->right - pSrcRect->left ), 
00518                                     ( pSrcRect->bottom - pSrcRect->top ), us16BPPColorKey );
00519 
00520             }
00521       }
00522       else if ( uiFlags & DDBLT_COLORFILL )
00523       {
00524             // do color fill here...
00525             FillRect16BPP( (UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, pDestRect->left, pDestRect->top, pDestRect->right, pDestRect->bottom, (UINT16)pDDBltFx->dwFillColor );
00526       }
00527       else
00528       {
00529             // Not supported.....
00530       }
00531 
00532 
00533       DDUnlockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pDestSurface, NULL );
00534 
00535       if ( pSrcSurface != NULL )
00536       {
00537             DDUnlockSurface( (LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2)pSrcSurface, NULL );
00538       }
00539 
00540       return( DD_OK );
00541 }
